questions.question: For a given glass ball in this experiment if you change the liquid from water to honey what happens to the velocity of the glass ball
If one performs the  same experiment in moon what do you expect the frictional force?

answers.d: No connection of planet and viscosity

questions.question: For a non Newtonian liquid will the same procedure work?

answers.a: It is applicable to non Newtonian liquid
answers.b: It is not applicable to non Newtonian liquid
answers.c: Viscosity has no connection whether the liquid is Newtonian or non Newtonian
answers.d: If the viscosity depends on shear stress the this procedure is applicable
